net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO

Class FixedLengthByteReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO.AbstractByteReader
      • net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO.FixedLengthByteReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IByteReader, IByteRecordReader

    public class FixedLengthByteReader
extends AbstractByteReader
    This class performs record oriented reading of Fixed Record Length (i.e. every record has the same length) files into "Line's" [Array of Byte]
    Version:
    0.55
    Author:
    Bruce Martin

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO.AbstractByteReader

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FixedLengthByteReader(int recordength)
      This class provides record oriented reading of Fixed Length (ie every record is exactly the same length) Binary files.
